code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Container,ListGroup}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AllTransactionsList=()=>{const[transactions,setTransactions]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTransactions=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/all_transactions');setTransactions(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching transactions:',error);}};fetchTransactions();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Transacciones"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{children:transactions.map(txn=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup.Item,{children:["Cliente ID: ",txn.ClientID.S," - Fondo ID: ",txn.FundID.N," - Monto: ",txn.Amount.N]},txn.TransaccionId.S))})]});};export default AllTransactionsList;
